thought: To craft pink_stained_glass, I first need to craft pink_dye. The only way to do so without any other ingredients is to use the peony at slot 31. Therefore, I will move the peony to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1
